audioText: L'entreprise a fait des profits énormes cette année grâce à sa nouvelle stratégie marketing.
question: What did the company achieve this year?
options: The company made enormous profits thanks to its new marketing strategy
The company made small profits thanks to its new marketing strategy
The company made enormous losses thanks to its new marketing strategy
The company made enormous profits thanks to its old marketing strategy
explanation: The text states 'L'entreprise a fait des profits énormes cette année grâce à sa nouvelle stratégie marketing' - The company made enormous profits this year thanks to its new marketing strategy. 'Énormes' means 'enormous' or 'huge'.
